resolutions.title: [ARFC] Aave Treasury RWA Allocation
resolutions.author: Asad Khan
resolutions.excerpt: This proposal brings on Centrifuge as a service provider to the Aave DAO to setup a legal structure to support RWA investments, develop RWA specific management and governance processes, and allocate $1M of the Aave Treasury's stablecoin holdings to a liquid US T-Bill fund on Centrifuge, as a proof of concept investment.
